pageContext.claim: “Pollak: The Stunning Synergy of The Atlantic‘s Anonymous Attack on Trump https://t.co/gDvXXn9tcH via @BreitbartNews Fake writer Goldberg is considered 'the unofficial stenographer of the Obama White House'.”
pageContext.analysis: Goldberg, who serves as the editor-in-chief of The Atlantic magazine, wrote about Obama’s foreign policy particularly in the Middle East and Africa. Although White House correspondents recommended and respected his work, he never covered the day-to-day of the Obama White House and so was certainly not a stenographer — official or “unofficial.”
